title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing a deer in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a deer entering the house? It indicates the marriage of a child in this house. The interpretation of seeing a deer killed in a dream? It indicates separation. What is the interpretation of seeing a deer’s antlers? Proof of strength and self-respect. The interpretation of seeing a small deer in a dream approaching it? Evidence that it is She will give birth soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead deer in a married woman’s dream? It indicates the loss of a loved one, materially or morally. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a dream: Seeing a deer entering a house indicates the marriage of a boy in that house. Then seeing a deer in a dream indicates good luck. Any A person who sees a deer escaping in a dream is evidence of missing some opportunities. Then a dead deer in a dream indicates bad friends. Killing a deer in a dream means separation. In most cases, seeing a deer in a dream is a sign of happy and praiseworthy things. A deer escaping is evidence On the complexity of some life problems for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about a deer for a single woman. A deer in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her beauty. Then to see a deer in someone’s dream means happy news and joy. Whoever sees some food filled with deer meat, this indicates an abundance of diet. After that, seeing a deer running away from a girl in a dream means losing something he has. Seeing deer antlers is evidence of strength and self-esteem. Seeing a deer in a dream for a pregnant woman. A deer in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of a beautiful child that she will give birth to. Then seeing the eyes of a deer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates Indicates that she will be exposed to some problems and troubles. Deer antlers in a dream indicate strength. Then seeing a deer in a pregnant woman’s dream is abundant and good. Interpretation of a dream about a deer for a man: If a man sees a deer running in a dream, this indicates a problem he will fall into. Then the eyes of a deer in a man’s dream are evidence On sad news. Seeing deer antlers in a dream indicates strength, courage, and self-respect. So deer blood in a man’s dream is an undesirable thing. Anyone who dreams of a small deer approaching him will soon have a child. Then, seeing a beautiful deer in a man’s dream indicates To improve his life’s affairs for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a deer for a married woman: Seeing the eyes of a deer in a dream is a sign of something sad. After that, seeing a dead deer in a married woman’s dream indicates the loss of something material or moral that she loves. Seeing a married woman in a dream eating deer meat This indicates sustenance and kindness that will come her way. After that, seeing deer antlers in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is a woman who enjoys honor and dignity. Deer blood in a married woman’s dream indicates some problems that she may fall into and cannot escape from.

title: Interpretation of a dream about revenge by an unknown person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unknown person taking revenge in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about an unknown person taking revenge in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about revenge by an unknown person in a dream could be an indication of an unstable life and God knows the unseen. Where if the dreamer sees revenge it can lead to problems that he faces and God knows bestWhen the dreamer sees Revenge in a dream may be evidence of weakness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gang of criminals in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a gang of criminals in a dream could be an indication of the mood, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a criminal gang may also represent competition and conflict in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees A gang of criminals in a dream. This may be evidence of coercion to do something, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a gang of criminals can express intimidation and threats to do something, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream. We did not find clear explanations to see this except that seeing Someone takes revenge on you, which may lead to committing sins, and you must repent, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees revenge against the enemy, this may indicate weakness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a single girl sees that she is taking revenge on a man, this could lead to weakness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about revenge. For the dead in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about taking revenge for the dead in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this, but revenge could be a sign of falling into disobedience and sins, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees taking revenge on someone in a dream, this may be a sign of the dreamer’s weakness, and God knows the unseen. And in the event that he sees The dreamer takes revenge on others, it may be a reference to the enemies surrounding him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a thief chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a thief chasing me in a dream. It could be that seeing a thief chasing me and running away is a sign of overcoming some difficult stages, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married man, the fear of Thieves can lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a thief, this may mean that he will get rid of distress, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees someone stealing, it may be evidence of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees someone stealing, he can express difficulties. That he faces, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone exploiting me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone exploiting me in a dream. We did not find clear explanations to see that. However, seeing someone lying to me can lead to wonderful opportunities, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a wallet by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a wallet refers to many concepts related to the dreamer’s life, and this becomes clear according to what the dreamer says regarding the details of the vision. The person may see that his wallet was stolen and contains a lot of money, and the dream in which he succeeds in recovering it may be from those who stole it, and there are those who dream of a torn wallet without Money. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a wallet: Dreaming about stealing a wallet with money can warn the dreamer of injustice and that he may suffer from it because of someone, and he must be strong and try hard to regain his rights with the help of God Almighty. Seeing a wallet stolen in a dream may mean that the dreamer may suffer from psychological pain. And sadness and that he must be patient and pray a lot to God Almighty for soon relief. The dream of stealing the wallet from the dreamer warns him of misbehavior, because this is bad and exposes the wrongdoer to many troubles and problems later, and God knows best. The dream of stealing my wallet could be a reflection of what is happening In the dreamer's mind there is fear and anxiety about some life issues, and here he needs to get closer to the Lord of the Worlds and increase his memory until his heart is at peace. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a wallet by Ibn SirinInterpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream about stealing money may be confirmation for the dreamer that he should pray to God Almighty often for the blessing of life. And abundant livelihood, and for a dream of stealing money from a position holder, this may be. It symbolizes reaching high positions and progress at work. Only the dreamer should not stop making effort and continuous work to reach these good things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of stealing a wallet for single women: A dream of stealing a bag for an unmarried girl may indicate the possibility that she will be exposed to some life problems and crises in The coming period, whether it is related to her personal or professional life, and therefore she must be strong and patient. We pray to God Almighty a lot to overcome difficulties, or a dream about stealing a wallet may be interpreted as a warning not to commit mistakes against others. A girl may dream that she finds a bag of money somewhere, and here the dream may tell her that she will receive a very good and abundant livelihood, and therefore she should The dreamer should try to get this goodness and be optimistic about the coming days. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a bag for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream that someone steals a wallet with money could be a warning to the dreamer that she will be exposed to bad luck in her work because of some people. Others. The dream of the theft of currency that one sees portends a lack of trust in others and that one should be more wise in his thinking so as not to put someone in a bad position because of his wrong assumptions, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet for a married woman. The dream about losing a wallet of money may It indicates the loss of happiness and comfort from the dreamer’s life and that she must be more careful in the matters of her life than before, and many prayers to God Almighty to continue his stable state and keep him away from any harm. A dream about losing his bag indicates the possibility of bad talk to the dreamer in society, and the need to stay away from it

title: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single girl: If a girl sees in her dream that she saw the sea alone. This dream indicates that this girl is afraid and confused about something and will not find anyone to support her in this matter. When an unmarried girl sees the sea in her dream, she enjoys looking at it and is happy. This vision indicates that this girl will address someone close to her. While the single sea is watching, but he is crying. This dream indicates that he will hear bad news. She will likely lose a loved one, whether from her family or from someone close to her. When a single girl sees The sea is in her dream and she cannot go out and swim. This dream indicates that there are obstacles in her life that prevent her from achieving her dreams. She tries to rise up to achieve them but fails. But if the girl sees that he is swimming and he is enjoying it, this vision indicates that he will hear beautiful and happy news in the coming period. Also She is diligent and excels in her tests and loves science. When an unmarried girl sees the sea blue, it turns black. This dream indicates that this girl has people in her life. They also try to hurt her with words, and they do not love her well and she has to take care of herself. If she sees a girl In her dream, the sea is high. This vision shows that she is immoral and disrespectful, and that her reputation is not good among the people, and it angers her parents. See also: Seeing the sea drying up in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the sea in her dream, then this sea is gentle and beautiful. It indicates This dream indicates that this woman is happy with her life and takes care of her children. She also loves them and takes care of them, takes care of her husband and performs household chores to the fullest. When a married woman sees in her dream that the sea is light in color, and she was happy looking at it. This dream indicates that this woman will hear Soon happy news about pregnancy and the birth of a child who will be fair to his parents. If a married woman sees in her dream that the sea is unclean. This vision shows that this woman is inappropriate and does not care about her husband nor is satisfied. She also takes actions without her husband’s permission and needs to reform herself. When a woman sees For a married woman, in her dream, the sea is small, and it makes her sad to look at it. This vision shows the many worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. And that her husband oppresses and tortures her, and there are many problems between them, and this leads to divorce between them. But if the married woman sees in her dream that the sea is light, She dips her feet in it, and enjoys. This dream indicates that this woman is comfortable and stable in her life. It also indicates that her husband will get free work and will pay all his debts. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man and its meaningIf one sees the sea In his dream, this sea is about to overflow. This dream indicates that this person is in trouble and will go through difficult circumstances and accumulate debts. It is difficult for him to solve all his problems on his own and he will seek help from people to help him. When a man sees in his dream that the sea is blue in color. This appears The vision is that this is a

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place: There is no doubt that falling from a high place can actually cause a person to die or be seriously injured, especially if he hits solid ground or the place is very high, such as a mountain or tower, or he falls from a car. What is the interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from above? Do they indicate associations that may be unwanted, or are they just dreams and expressions of obsessions, fears, and negative thoughts that control the subconscious? Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place Next, we will learn about the most important interpretations of one of the strangest dreams that a sleeper can see, which is Dreaming of fear of falling from above: Seeing the dreamer’s fear of falling from a height in a dream indicates the anxiety and tension that controls him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is afraid of falling from a height, will move to a new life that does not suit him. The dream interpretation of fear of falling from above reflects difficulties And the obstacles that the dreamer faces and disturb the tranquility of his life. Interpretation of the dream of fear of falling from a high position by Ibn Sirin, according to Ibn Sirin regarding the vision of fear of falling from above in a dream as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the dreamer’s fear of falling from a height in the dream as evidence of his determination to succeed and not Despair despite the obstacles and difficulties he faces. If the dreamer is wealthy and rich and sees in his dream that he is afraid of falling from above, then he is afraid of losing his money and losing his influence. The intense fear of falling from above in the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s fear of facing something in reality and always running away from what It is reflected in his vision, and they are nothing but dreams. Interpretation of a single person’s dream of fear of falling from a height. Most jurists unanimously agree on the interpretation of a dream of fear of falling from a height for single people, which is that the cause or interpretation is due to psychological reasons and fears, as we will see as follows: Interpretation of a dream of fear of falling from a height Height for single people indicates the pressures and psychological disorders that she suffers from, perhaps due to delayed marriage. If the dreamer gets engaged and sees in her dream that she is standing on a high place and is afraid of falling, this is an indication that there are many problems and disagreements in her romantic relationship and she must think again before marriage. As for the dreamer She is studying and sees in herself that she is afraid of falling from a height. She is afraid of approaching exams, and she must put these concerns out of her mind and focus on studying. Seeing an unmarried woman may reflect that she is afraid of falling from a height, and fear of deception and betrayal due to the emotional trauma she experienced in the past. Interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling among single people. Jurists differed in the interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling among single people. Some of them see it as a good thing while others believe the opposite, as we will see as follows: The interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling indicates the fulfillment of ambitions and aspirations and a life full of stability. As Ibn Sirin says. While some scholars believe that seeing a girl in her dream who is afraid of falling from a height could foretell the presence of deceivers in her life, betrayal by those close to her, and failure in her romantic relationships. Interpretation of a woman’s dream

title: What is the interpretation of the death of a dead person in a dream?

preview.html: The death of a dead person in a dream. Many people may see in a dream the death of a dead person in a dream, and they do not know the interpretation or what this vision may indicate in terms of sadness, the illusion of the deceased, his happiness in his grave, or his request for supplication from the person who had this vision. Interpretation of seeing the death of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin through The site is different, and the interpretation of this vision can be known, whether the dreamer is a man, a woman, or even a single woman, as the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted it as follows: If someone dreams that he sees a tree sap die again. This vision indicates that this person will lose a family member soon. But if the dreamer finds that the dead person has risen from his death and is laughing, then this vision indicates that the dead person has been forgiven by God, and that it is a good omen for the dead person to bless his grave. And if the dead person goes After he rose from his death and went to the fortune teller and greeted him, this vision indicates that the fortune teller was suffering from many diseases and this vision indicates his recovery from his illness. The dead person who rose from his sleep and attended the dreamer’s wedding. This vision indicates that the dreamer will propose marriage to a member of the deceased’s family and he will be overwhelmed with happiness. However, if the deceased died in the dreamer’s dream, then rose from his death and screamed, confusing everyone around him, and the dreamer heard the screams and lamentations of those around him, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will fall. In a great calamity. Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted this vision in several ways, depending on the condition of the person who sees it, as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his family members has died, then rises from his death, and then dies again, then this vision It indicates that this person will remove his worries and his problems will be solved. However, if the deceased rose from his death in the dreamer’s dream and began complaining to the dreamer about his condition and what happened to him, then this vision indicates that the worries and problems will stop on the shoulders of the dreamer. However, if the deceased rose from his sleep and then died Once again he does not know who saw him? This vision indicates that the dreamer will travel to a place that no one knows. And if the dreamer was the one who died in his dream? This vision is evidence that he fell into many problems, but only for a short time. Interpretation of the death of a dead person in a dream for single people: If an unmarried woman dreams that she saw a dead person dying, and he was smiling and nothing affected her, then this is evidence that this girl will succeed in her studies if she is still studying. However, if an unmarried woman cries intensely in her dream about the death of her relatives, then this vision indicates that one of her family members is suffering from a serious illness or distress, and that this relief is near. And if the deceased came to the unmarried girl in her dream and gave her a gift, then this vision is a sign. Until the right person will propose to this girl. In the event that the deceased takes the unmarried girl by the hand and takes her to a place she does not know. This vision indicates that this girl will be forced to do something she does not want under the pressure of her family. If the unmarried girl is beaten in her sleep and is afraid of seeing the death of a dead person in a dream, this dream indicates that the girl will get a new job. If the unmarried woman sees that her father or mother has died in the dream, this dream indicates that the girl will get a new job.

title: Interpretation of a dream about what comes out of the mouth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of something coming out of the mouth in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried woman, if a piece of cloth comes out of the mouth, a piece of wire, white foam, pebbles, white foam, or something stuck to the neck, according to Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. And others. Interpretation of things that come out of the mouth in a dream. If the thing that comes out of the mouth in the dream is food or drink without vomiting, then this is an interpretation of the loss of something related to earning a livelihood, work, or money. Interpretation of a snake coming out of the mouth in a dream. This vision indicates that the owner The dream will get rid of the disease soon. But if the dreamer is sick, this dream means that he will die. And sometimes if the dreamer sees a snake coming out of his mouth, this may mean that he will get rid of a major problem that is bothering him. Interpretation of insects coming out of the mouth in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of insects coming out of the mouth is a sign Anxiety, sadness, and enemies for the dreamer. Seeing insects coming out of the mouth indicates the evil that will happen to a person. For a man to see insects coming out of his mouth, this is a sign that there are enemies around him, but he will soon overcome them. If one sees insects coming out of his mouth, this is a sign of poverty The extreme that afflicts him. Seeing a person expelling many insects from his mouth and attacking him is a sign that he is afflicted with a malignant disease. Interpretation of a needle coming out of the mouth in a dream When a person sees in his dream that a needle is coming out of his mouth, this is a sign that events and certain words will appear soon. In a dream, seeing a needle coming out From the mouth means that the dreamer will get rid of his worries, problems, and loss. Seeing needles coming out of the mouth in a dream indicates that the person knows his colleagues at work who will receive support and assistance. Needles coming out of the mouth in a dream show that the person is preoccupied with bad things said about his family that cause him harm and distress, And he tries to fix it. Seeing a needle coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate knowing the facts and revealing the dreamer’s truth to those around him, and God knows best. Interpretation of dirt coming out of the mouth in a dreamIn a dream, seeing dirt in the mouth indicates the joy and happiness that will fill the dreamer’s life in the coming period. Vision. Dirt in the mouth or hair in a dream means the dreamer arriving at the Gulf and rejecting problems after worrying and extreme fatigue. A pregnant woman who sees dirt in her mouth in her dream indicates that she has given birth to a male child. The dust covering the dreamer’s face in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to problems and disputes. Family and family. Seeing him eating dirt in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s upcoming Hajj and visit to the Holy House of God, and God knows best. Interpretation of cockroaches coming out of the mouth in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming of cockroaches coming out of his mouth in a dream is a sign of many enemies around him. Dreaming of cockroaches coming out of the mouth in a dream. Your mouth is a sign of the presence of many hypocrites in life. If someone sees that there is a bout of cockroaches and they come out of his mouth, this is a sign of crises and problems. If one dreams of cockroaches coming out of his mouth, this is evidence of the difficulty of achieving goals and desires. Seeing cockroaches coming out of the mouth

title: Interpretation of seeing a closet in a dream and a closet in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a wardrobe for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether the wardrobe, utensils and dishes, iron money, buying wood, permission, opening, closing, locking, loss of Ibn Sirin. The cellar refers to the mother, as the mother is the only safe world in which a person can take refuge. In it in her arms without feeling fear, terror, or betrayal by time and people. The dreamer’s vision of the cupboard in his dream is a strong indication of nostalgia for the time when he was inside his mother’s womb, which is when the dreamer takes his food and drink without her help. Seeing the treasure is a reflection of a bad psychological feeling Which the viewer feels, such as a feeling of alienation or loneliness, or memories that left deep wounds inside him. There are many clues related to seeing a basement in a dream. Seeing money in the closet means deprivation or lack of money. Seeing pictures refers to the past with its good or bad memories, and books symbolize hope, while seeing papers and documents indicate problems and the accumulation of responsibilities on the viewer. Seeing dust and dirt in the storeroom indicates weakness and illness, while seeing food in the storeroom indicates To the halal supply that is blessed and preserved in it. As for seeing the cupboard full of dishes, utensils and cups, whether made of glass, vases or plastic, the fortuneteller’s life will change and he will enter a new phase in his life where he needs material and moral support to pass this phase successfully. This vision could be A sign of marriage, travel or work. A small cupboard in a dream shows the dreamer's narrow horizon, his praiseworthy thinking, his limited resources and his limited ability to achieve his goals in the future. Seeing a cupboard with books, pens, watches, phone, keys, pictures, etc. Of the familiar personal things, it is a positive vision that indicates a positive change in the dreamer’s life. As for the dreamer seeing a cupboard with food, this indicates nutrition and is related to the financial situation of that person. The cupboard full of bread (bread) only shows the difficulty of life and the low standard of living. The cupboard is full With fruits and vegetables, it shows a decent and luxurious life, while an empty cupboard or seeing a refrigerator empty of food shows poverty and need, or the presence of problems, crises, and major social differences. As for seeing the dreamer collecting things, stacking them, and storing them in a place, storeroom, or cupboard, this indicates the dreamer’s appetite and ambition to acquire money. Storing and investing. Storage can refer to a state of fear and anxiety experienced by the viewer, either as a result of professional, emotional or social circumstances, as well as other problems that we may face in life. A safe is a safe made of metal and has a secret number to open it and contains money and valuables. Such as jewelry, jewelry, documents, etc. Which the viewer fears of theft and loss. Seeing a cellar in a dream shows the number of secrets and information that the dreamer knows and fears that others will discover. The cellar can indicate

title: Interpretation of words that revolve in a dream and flirt in a dream

preview.html: Flirting, flirting, flirting, flirting, or flirting is a social and sexual behavior that involves oral or written communication or body language from one person to another, either to show interest in a deeper relationship with another person, either to entertain when done as a joke, Wikipedia website, or as for the dream of flirting, it is kind of strange What, such as saying flirtatious words to a lover, fiancé, or husband, or flirtatious words between a fiancé, or between spouses, or over a courtship. , or any guy I know who is flirting with me for single women, or a guy who is flirting with me, or a girl who is flirting with me, or a guy who is flirting with me, and more. All of these visions, and we will explain them to you further, according to Ibn Sirin, one of the greatest Arab dream interpreters. Interpretation of spinning in a dream: To see in a dream that he is spinning and playing with words means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of gain and profit thanks to the positive steps he has taken in his life, and he will, God willing, go to a new job and achieve it. Lots of profits from it. He will live with great joy and begin to improve the circumstances in which he finds himself. Between him and a family member, with whom the visionary lived in a dispute, and that thanks to the support of the spouse or a close relative, he will advance in his field of work. Rolling words in a dream express one’s happiness and confidence in life, as well as the goods and good things that one possesses. It also expresses The good people that the dreamer always passes by indicate the improvement of his business and the failure to cut off his source of income. It is a dream that indicates health and well-being throughout life. The dream of flirting indicates that you will meet people who have everything, and an interesting person will influence the dreamer and enter into a new social life. And if the visionary is single, then in reality this person will be very spoiled, always smiling, and behaving He gets along well with people and gets to know a person who loves to have fun. His life will be colored in an instant, and he will experience great love. Likewise, a person who sees himself spinning in a dream will find no anxiety in his situation. He will live a life free of sadness. He will always be lucky in all matters. He will also experience... Some developments at work, and these developments will make his face laugh, leave his nation behind, achieve his dreams in all ways and matters, and organize his life in the desired manner. The psychological interpretation of seeing flirting in a dream instead of a person who admires flirting with the opposite sex and people who want sweet words and are in desperate need of love and someone He did not see love and respect when he was young and wants to find it now. Interpretation: You are flirting in a dream: Courting a wife means experiencing family happiness and living a full life with her loved ones. This vision draws attention between the spouses and also indicates that the stormy and difficult days in the past have passed and that you will get to know each other. News in the coming days and you will have a beautiful daughter. Your family will grow and you will find yourself in a very cheerful family. As for courting an unmarried girl, it means that you will have a good marriage, have children, and enjoy living in peace. Interpretation of courting Sh.

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream, the complete correct interpretation

preview.html: Today, through the encyclopedia website, we present the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream, since dreams are a wide and large world, full of symbols, signs, and associations, where anxiety creeps into everyone’s hearts as a result of seeing a dream with trivial signs or not realizing the importance of its symbols, so they search the Internet for the interpretation of their visions, and there is no doubt that The world of dreams is neither a myth nor ignorance, and the evidence for this is the mention of dreams in the Holy Qur’an, as God Almighty said in His beloved book in Surat Yusuf, verse 4 “When Joseph said to his father, O father, I have seen eleven of his cousins, the sun, and the Lord of God, his parents, may God bless him and grant him peace The throne and they fell down in prostration before it. Prison, and the Bedouins brought you after the two devils broke out between me and my brothers. My Lord has given me what He wills. He is the All-Knowing, the All-Wise Small in their dreams, it is a symbol that spreads among many people People in their dreams, and below we will learn about seeing a little girl in a dream in general: Seeing a child in a dream is considered a praiseworthy and blessed vision. Children are a great blessing from God, and in a dream following a large diet is a sign of goodness. A little girl in a dream symbolizes happy events and the situation will change. For the better. A young girl in a dream shows the doors to livelihood and happiness. It symbolizes a lot of money and abundant livelihood that will soon come to the dreamer. Seeing a young girl in a dream indicates success and superiority on the social and life level. As for possessing a girl in a dream, whether as a wife or successor, this means Contrary to what is expected, it indicates good and abundant money that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of a dream of a beautiful little girl laughing at single people. A single girl always wishes goodness from God, and hopes for a happy life and dreams come true. The little girl in one dream with: A little girl in one dream symbolizes Longing to be a mother and a happy home. A young girl in a single girl’s dream indicates success in studies and excellence in what she does. Explains: Seeing a young girl’s clothes are beautiful and their shape is clear, it is a good, abundant and wonderful thing that you have come to a single girl. As for seeing a child whose clothes are dirty and neglected in their cleanliness This indicates some turmoil and turmoil that he will go through in the coming period, but all knowledge is with God, so it is not necessary for it to be a vision. Interpretation of a dream about transferring a girl to a married woman: A married woman hopes that God will grant her the love of her husband, peace, tranquility, and unparalleled happiness, and she also hopes that Her children will be in the best condition and happiness. Seeing a little girl in a dream: A little child in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the goodness and happiness that they will obtain. The little girl in a married woman’s dream symbolizes a change in her life situation for the better. Seeing a married woman as A little girl means contentment
